alert.note: Alert for Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 23 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Montana, including the following county, Pondera. * WHEN...Until 215 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1115 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southeastern Pondera County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
